message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but given my budget, I am only able to offer $10000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offers. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose an offer of $11000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle of our expectations.

I understand that we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11500. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to sell the product to you. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose an offer of $11000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
